translation.es: Y probablemente, querrá que sepamos jugar bien,

translation.en: Yeah, none of us would be on this team without Coach.

translation.en: Well, I'd probably still be on the team since I get almost all of our points.

translation.en: Coach brought us all together. You guys are like family, except we don't date each other.

translation.en: Hell, I'll do anything to keep this group together.

translation.en: - Me too. - We've gotta save him.

translation.en: Ben, I'm worried about you.
translation.es: Ron, me preocupas.

translation.en: You're worried about me? I'm worried about me.

translation.en: I only have $85 to my name, Dad,

translation.en: and I need another $415,
translation.es: Necesito otros $415,

translation.en: and I need it now, or I'm done.

translation.en: I came from your nut.

translation.en: I lived inside your balls.

translation.en: I shot out your dick.

translation.en: Four hundred and fifteen bucks and we call our relationship even, square.
translation.es: Son solo $415 para decir que estamos a mano.

translation.en: Come on. Help a coach out.

translation.en: I'd love to help a coach out, but I don't see one here.

translation.en: Look, they say winning isn't everything,
translation.es: Dicen que ganar no lo es todo,

translation.en: but that's just to make failures like you feel better.
translation.es: para que los fracasados como tú se sientan mejor.

translation.en: How about some three- point bourbon shots on the house?
translation.es: Los invito a unos tragos de bourbon de tres puntos.

translation.en: Just make sure you tag the restaurant.

translation.en: Please, I need the money, Dad.

translation.en: Son, if I gave you money whenever you asked for it,
translation.es: Hijo, si te diera dinero siempre que me lo pides,

translation.en: I'd be as poor as you.

translation.en: Is that what you want for your dad?

translation.en: Look, I told you. I'll pay for graduate school.

translation.en: You can study business and help out here at the restaurant.

translation.en: Restaurant school, huh? So I can serve overpriced slop to your aging fans?

translation.en: I have bigger dreams than that.

translation.en: Oh, shit, Ben. I've heard your dreams.

translation.en: Even if you did have multiple dicks,

translation.en: no one's gonna suck them more than one at a time.

translation.en: You know what? I'm not gonna do this. Not here. Not in my restaurant.

translation.en: This is a classy family restaurant, you dickhead.

translation.en: And leave that poor woman alone, all right? She's been through enough.

translation.en: Oh, Shannon, you should see these two horses fuck each other.

translation.en: It reminds me of our first date when we watched those horses fucking each other.

translation.en: You know what was funny?
translation.es: Lo gracioso

translation.en: Oh, that was fun.

translation.en: Look, until I sign the divorce papers, you're still my wife,
translation.es: Mira, hasta que firme el divorcio, sigues siendo mi esposa y la novia de mi mejor amigo.

translation.es: sigues siendo mi esposa y la novia de mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: I think it's pretty awesome that I'm cool with that.

translation.en: I don't give a fuck what you're cool with. That's why I left you, loser.

translation.en: Shannon, honey, look at me.

translation.en: I'm a desperate man.

translation.es: Necesito $415 hoy

translation.en: or I lose my job and everything I've ever worked for.
translation.es: o perderé mi trabajo y todo por lo que he trabajado.

translation.en: Help me out, please!

translation.en: Being a basketball coach is all I've ever dreamed of.
translation.es: Ser entrenador de básquetbol ha sido mi único sueño.

translation.en: Actually, know what this reminds me of?
translation.es: Esto me recuerda a algo.

translation.en: If you say the words, Little Man Tate, I swear to God...
translation.es: Si mencionas a El pequeño Tate, te juro que…

translation.en: You remember how Little Man Tate tripped on his own feet a bunch of times
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas que El pequeño Tate se tropezó varias veces

translation.en: before you realize his gift of just being a little man

translation.en: stuck in a Tate's body?
translation.es: atrapado en su cuerpo de Tate?

translation.en: Ben, I'm not giving you any money.

translation.en: We are not getting back together,

translation.en: and I hate to break it to you, but Little Man Tate sucks.

translation.en: Thanks, Scott. There's a lot here. This really helps.

translation.en: We don't want you to lose your job, Coach. We love this team.

translation.en: Scott, I don't know what to say.
translation.es: Scott, no sé qué decir.

translation.en: Oh, Coach. It's so much more than that.

translation.en: They moved away from points, and it's been transformative.

translation.es: Eres hermosa tal y como eres. No necesitas tetas más grandes.

translation.en: You could pawn it. Probably get a hundred bucks.

translation.en: Thank you, Timebomb. This is great.
translation.es: Genial. Gracias, Mecha Corta.

translation.en: When your little brother learns to talk, tell him, Thanks.

translation.en: This is all my bar mitzvah money, Coach. I want you to have it.
translation.es: Tome. Es el dinero de mi bar mitzvá.

translation.en: Thanks, Isaac. Although you know what?
translation.es: Gracias, Isaac. Pero ¿sabes qué?

translation.en: I deserve this money for sitting through that fucking thing.

translation.en: Shit music. Horrible food. Silly hats.
translation.es: Música de mierda, comida horrible y sombreros tontos.

translation.en: I did like the chair thing though.

translation.en: Oh, and by the way, didn't they say at the end of that thing you'd become a man?

translation.en: When the fuck is that gonna happen?

translation.en: Technically, it has happened.

translation.en: My parents give me 20 bucks every time I get an A, and I've invested wisely in Bitcoin.

translation.en: Well, thankfully, if you include the firearm,
translation.es: Bueno, con la escopeta,

translation.en: Great. I'll just hold on to it until the global economy inevitably collapses.

translation.en: So you got the money! Everything's gonna work out, right?

translation.en: This is not where I wanted to be at this stage in my life.
translation.es: No esperaba estar haciendo esto en esta etapa de mi vida.

translation.en: Offering illegal sex to an underage kid to help my career.

translation.en: I wanna turn heads.

translation.en: I'm sick of being anonymous!

translation.en: Seven feet.
translation.es: Mide 2.13 metros.

translation.en: You might want to stretch.

translation.en: As you can see, I've kept my end of the bargain.

translation.en: She's not a ten but a solid six.

translation.en: Five maybe. Four at the worst.

translation.en: so even if you've got a below- average schlong, I'm betting it's still pretty big.

translation.en: That's everything!

translation.en: You'll regret this, buddy. My dad owns a restaurant.

translation.en: Good luck on Saturday, Coach.

translation.en: I'm so grateful that nobody fucked me in there!

translation.en: Sure, my ego's hurt a little, but nonetheless, thank you, God.

translation.en: Shan, whatever you're gonna say, I deserve it.

translation.en: This is the lowest of the low.

translation.es: Más bajo que aquella vez que nadie quiso fornicarme por el culo hace unas horas.

translation.en: I'm gonna lose my job, Shannon, and it's all my fault.

translation.en: You're a pervert.

translation.en: - Can I help you, sir? - Yeah.

translation.en: but I'm sure we can find something.

translation.en: The school board is getting antsy.

translation.en: I assumed I was fired.

translation.en: Uh... If you didn't hear about it, then, uh, no, I didn't get arrested.

translation.es: Realmente lo intenté, pero creo que sería mejor

translation.en: You know, no one in my entire life has ever wanted me anywhere.

translation.en: Boring! Sorry, the story was just really boring.
translation.es: ¡Aburrido! Lo siento, tu historia es muy aburrida.

translation.en: No, I get it. It was... It was pretty boring. You're right.
translation.es: Sí, lo entiendo. Es bastante aburrida, tiene razón.

translation.en: Matty, come here, you tall, lanky weirdo.
translation.es: Matty, ven aquí, bicho raro alto y largirucho.

translation.en: I gotta say, I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship,
translation.es: Creo que este es el inicio de una hermosa amistad.

translation.en: and that right there is a quote from Little Man Tate.
translation.es: Esa es una cita de El pequeño Tate.

translation.en: I think.
translation.es: Eso creo.

translation.en: It didn't download properly. I never got to see the whole movie.
translation.es: No se descargó bien. Nunca pude ver toda la película.
